name: Germ Attack
description:
Germ Attack is a Call of Duty: Black Ops zombie mode inspired first person shooter in which you must survive against countless germs using your guns and your wits. Run around any buy as many weapons as you can while also keeping an eye on your ammo count. Be sure to open doors to find new areas, weapons, and upgrades. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

F - Action

R - Reload

1 - HealMatic 500

2 - GermOBlaster (AR)

3 - Pill (Grenade)

4 - GermShotty

Esc - Pause Menu

Dev Notes:

- When you buy a new weapon, be sure to click on the corresponding number in order to pull it out

- When buying upgrades, switch to your current weapon by clicking the corresponding number in order for the upgrade to apply

- As of right now there is no health system so just pretend, this will be coming in the future

- If you run out of ammo and don't have any points, there's no way to get any more. A fix for this will come soon, possibly in the form of a melee weapon

- Project is still in early development and more updates are soon to come
